channel.title: How to play 3.2 moparscape with my brother?
channel.description: Hey dude's I've Downloaded the Client of Mopar scape 3.2 and want to play with my brother. We have 2 computers on lan and I want to know how can we connect at the same server.

item.title: How to play 3.2 moparscape with my brother?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Open your command prompt and type ipconfig
You should see something like this
Connection-specific DNS Suffix . : --------.cowsmilkisgood
Link-local IPv6 Address . . . . . : t5h9i9s8n0o5t7
IPv4 Address. . . . . . . . . . . : 192.168.1.30
Subnet Mask . . . . . . . . . . . : 255.255.255.0
Default Gateway . . . . . . . . . : 192.168.1.1

So, on the computer hosting you will see 192.168.1.30 or something like that, on your brothers computer type that as the IP after you hit start server and you are logged in, it should allow you to log on, that is if you are connected through the same modem/router.

Read full topic
item.source: How to play 3.2 moparscape with my brother?
